content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ this pattern includes a chart as well as written instructions each spring i look for a project i can take on the go i love being outdoors and spending the afternoons outside and this wrap is the perfect to-go pattern easy and simple repeat and an entire wrap in one cake of yarn this pattern is worked as an asymmetrical wrap starting from the narrow end and working to the wide end gauge is not crucial on this pattern many different yarns can be substituted since it is a simple increasing repeat for a larger wrap continue repeats until desired size supplies 5 00mm h hook yarn needle stitch marker yardage approx 623 yards one cake of yarn other yarns of the same weight can be substituted scheepjes whirl knit picks comfy fingering rico design creative cotton degrade originally released april 2018 updated 2022 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1040647756006202/
